name: Su'ccess and Fai'Lure
description:
A Short 1 puzzle game.

Find the Word that will cure your dark god of a curse. The other Cultists have hints for you.

WASD + Arrows to move
E or LMB to talk/interact

Music created with: https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html

All sounds CC0 from: Freesound.org

Everything else by Ilias Lays.

This is more of a visual prototype/ learning experiment

Thank you anyone who plays the game!
